code: @Test public void verifyConsumerTemplate() {     assertThat("Consumer template Camel context is incorrect!", consumer.getCamelContext().getName(), is(equalTo("test"))).     assertThat("Consumer template cache size is incorrect!", consumer.getMaximumCacheSize(), is(equalTo(100))). }

@Test public void sendMessageToInbound() {     inbound.sendBody("seda:foo", "message").     String body = consumer.receiveBody("seda:foo", TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMillis(1L), String.class).     assertThat("Body is incorrect!", body, is(equalTo("message"))). }
